mapper.select: select id, task, progress, priority from lists ORDER BY priority ASC, updated_date DESC
mapper.insert: insert into lists(task, progress, priority) values (#{task}, #{progress}, #{priority})
mapper.update: update lists set task = #{task}, progress = #{progress}, priority = #{priority}, updated_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id = #{id}
